nodes.bodyText: Pls use response.cur instead of DEFAULT_BID_CURRENCY.
No need for this check, org.prebid.server.validation.RequestValidator#validate already does it.
Minor. Make this variable final as of project code style.

Potentially, getPlc() may return NULL.
Pls use StringUtils.isNotEmpty() from apache-commons.
No need for additional annotations here, look at org.prebid.server.json.ObjectMapperProvider for our json mapper.
This w and h are not applied to banner.
May be final.
May be final.
Format can be not defined, we need to care of it.

This line actually doesn't change imps in request.
Imp is immutable object, so we need to apply here new updated list of imps.

Pls check the logic in org.prebid.server.bidder.HttpBidderRequester#isOkOrNoContent method and how it is used.
Suppose, we don't need to check response codes here.
PS. other bidders can do the same but seems it is redundant action.
We can rid off this variable, just return banner in last line of this method.
Pls combine with the condition above and return video instead if breaking the loop.
Pls fix typo in Baner
This json node can be removed since aliases is not used in test. Pls remove it from PBS initial request.
No need for debug here, we use it in several key bidders like appnexus and rubicon. Pls remove it from PBS initial request.
This can be removed.
This can be removed. Since it is core functionality processing. Pls remove it from PBS initial request.
No need for digitrust in bidder test. Pls remove it from PBS initial request.

Minor. Make indent here.
PS. if we'll have a time, may be it make sense to add checkstyle rule for this case.
We don't need additional checks here since org.prebid.server.currency.CurrencyConversionService#convertCurrency already does it.
Please don't use real URLs in tests. This can confuse when urls will be changed in configuration.
No need in-place currency rates in bidder tests.
We can remove entire user object here since GDPR is 0 in request.
Would be better if we'll avoid re-assignment for variables. So, make this one final and if you want to updated it - just create another like updatedImp with desired changes.
Minor. Please use CollectionUtils.isEmpty(..) for format checking.
Set id to 333 - https://vendorlist.consensu.org/v-206/vendorlist.json
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,23 @@
+adapters:
+  inmobi:
+    enabled: false
+    endpoint: https://api.w.inmobi.com/showad/openrtb/bidder/prebid
+    pbs-enforces-gdpr: true
+    pbs-enforces-ccpa: true
+    modifying-vast-xml-allowed: true
+    deprecated-names:
+    aliases:
+    meta-info:
+      maintainer-email: prebid-support@inmobi.com
+      app-media-types:
+        - banner
+        - video
+      site-media-types:
+      supported-vendors:
+      vendor-id: 0
